snippet: After a long wait interspersed with tidbits, the main course in a celebration of the centennial of Stravinsky’s “Rite of Spring” at the University of North Carolina.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by the Mariinsky Orchestra at Memorial Hall in Chapel Hill, NC.
lead_paragraph: After a long wait interspersed with tidbits, the main course in a celebration of the centennial of Stravinsky’s “Rite of Spring” at the University of North Carolina.

headline.seo: Mariinsky Orchestra Plays ‘Rite of Spring’ in North Carolina
headline.main: Spring Is Here, or at Least It Is in North Carolina
headline.print_headline: Spring Is Here, or at Least It Is in North Carolina
